name: extract_text
description: Extract text content from a PPTX artifact. Use this tool when you need to read text from a PowerPoint presentation.

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the PPTX artifact to extract text from

text.description: The complete extracted text from all slides
The extracted text from this slide

notes.description: The speaker notes for this slide

slides.description: Text extracted from each slide separately with notes

name: extract_tables
description: Extract tables from a PPTX artifact. Use this tool when you need to extract tabular data from a PowerPoint presentation.

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the PPTX artifact to extract tables from

format.description: Output format for table data. 'json' returns array of arrays, 'markdown' returns formatted markdown table.

slide_number.description: The slide number (1-indexed) where the table was found

table_index.description: The index of the table on the slide (0-indexed)

data.description: The table data. Array of arrays for JSON format, markdown string for markdown format.

tables.description: List of extracted tables with their locations
